sentences.en: Chairman of the committee was elected by ballot.
sentences.cn: 该委员会主任是投票选举的.

sentences.en: He publicly attacked the people who've been calling for secret ballot nominations.
sentences.cn: 他公开抨击了那些主张用不记名投票方式确定任命人选的人。

sentences.en: Her name has been put on the ballot.
His nominee for vice president was elected only after a second ballot.
sentences.cn: 他提名的副总统在两轮投票后才当选。

sentences.en: Martinez expressed confidence of victory at the ballot box.
sentences.cn: 马丁内斯表示了对选举获胜的信心。

sentences.en: The ballot boxes have been switched.
The members have demanded a ballot.
The party leader is elected by secret ballot .
sentences.cn: 政党领袖是通过无记名投票选举产生的。

sentences.en: The people make their wishes known through the ballot box.
sentences.cn: 人们以投票方式表达他们的愿望。

sentences.en: The poll was widely discredited after allegations of ballot rigging.
sentences.cn: 选举舞弊的指控出现后，这次投票测验受到了广泛质疑。

sentences.en: The procedure he created was a two - tier ballot.
sentences.cn: 他倡议的新办法,是两次投票法.

sentences.en: The result showed he had polled enough votes to force a second ballot.
sentences.cn: 结果显示，他已获得了足够把对手拖入二次投票的票数。

sentences.en: The state election due in November will be the last such ballot before next year's presidential contest.
sentences.cn: 定于11月举行的州选举将是明年总统竞选前最后一次此类投票选举。

sentences.en: The union said they will ballot members on whether to strike.
sentences.cn: 工会称他们将组织会员们秘密投票表决是否罢工。

sentences.en: They succeeded in putting Perot's name on the ballot in Florida.
sentences.cn: 他们成功地让佩罗在佛罗里达州成为了候选人之一。

sentences.en: Workers at the plant held a ballot and rejected strike action.
sentences.cn: 工厂工人举行投票，否决了罢工行动。
